mapper.insert: insert into CAFEREVIEW (cafe, drink, price, star, photo, review) values (#{cafe} , #{drink} , #{price} , #{star}, #{photo} , #{review})
mapper.update: update CAFEREVIEW set cafe=#{cafe}, drink=#{drink}, price=#{price}, star=#{star}, photo=#{photo}, review=#{review} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from CAFEREVIEW order by id desc
